1370: Stephanus moved to Bloemendaelse straet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Auesoete at age 28 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Auesoete, Marcilius, at age 30.
1373: Had a son with Auesoete, Sylof, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Auesoete, Pietersen, at age 36.
1379: Had a daughter with Auesoete, Gheesen, at age 37.
1382: Had a son with Auesoete, Geykonis, at age 40.
1383: Had a son with Auesoete, Ricout, at age 41.
1387: Had a daughter with Auesoete, Flore, at age 45.
